gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.main
Class MainMenuBar

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JMenuBar
                  gov.nih.nci.cbiit.cmts.ui.main.MainMenuBar
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.MenuElement
public class MainMenuBar
extends javax.swing.JMenuBar

This class manages the definitions and instantiations of menu items. It will coordinate ContextManager class to deal with context sensitive menu switches.

Since:
CMTS v1.0
See Also:
Serialized Form
